data.text:
German Immigrants in American Church Records - Vol. 40: Texas II; Edited by Roger P. Minert; Ph.D., A.G.; October 2023; 543 pp; Hard Cover; Every-name index; Acid Free Paper; ISBN 978-1-62859-367-9; Item #FR0690.

Dr. Minert and a team of researchers at BYU are currently involved in a project wherein they read and extract Americans' German vital records from historic local church vital records. These church records often pinpoint German origins in the "old country." Places and dates of birth, marriage, and previous residence in Germany are commonly found in these records. Dr. Minert estimates that 65-76 percent of historic local church records give an immigrant's exact place of birth. Entries found in the volumes include people born in Switzerland and Austria.

Churches found in this volume are from a total of 23 counties: Austin, Bastrop, Bell, Bexar, Brazos, DeWitt, Eastland, Erath, Falls, Fannin, Fayette, Gillespie, Guadalupe, Hamilton, Harris, Haskell, Hunt, Lavaca, Medina, Milam, Mills, Washington, and Williamson.

Note that there is a 3056 surname index to this book at the end of this entry.

Forty-Six churches have been extracted in this volume.

The Following is from the Table of Contents:

2. Charlottenburg, Lavaca Co., Zion Evangelical Lutheran Church

3. Greencreek, Erath Co., Bethany Lutheran Church

46. Yorktown, DeWitt Co., St. Paul’s Evangelical Lutheran Church

Index of Personal Names

Typical entries from the St. Peter’s United Lutheran Church Spring Branch, Harris Co., Texas are as follows:

Marianna Groschke b. Königsberg, Preußen 18 Nov 1844; m. TX 18 Dec 1869, Johann Fr. Hoffmann; d. 17 Aug 1909, age 64-9-0; bur. Bear Creek, Harris Co., TX 18 Aug 1909. She immigrated in 1849. Ref: p. 282.

Karl Golbow b. Lenzen, Preußen 17 Jan 1821; m. TX 1850, Dorothea Schulz; d. 21 Aug 1909, age 88-7-0; bur. Spring Branch 22 Aug 1909. He immigrated in 1849. Ref: pp. 282-283.

Heinrich Ludwig Emil Buchmann b. Braunschweig (duchy) 1 Feb 1854; m. Johanna Wilhelmine Dorette Gerloff; d. 8 Feb 1911; bur. Spring Branch, TX 9 Feb 1911. Ref: p. 283

August Michel b. Schlesien 19 Mar 1868; m. TX 23 Nov 1893, Louise Martens; d. 2 Jul 1914; bur. Spring Branch, TX 3 Jul 1914. He immigrated in 1890. Ref: p. 286.

Heinrich Schaper b. Essenrode, Hannover 31 Jul 1833; m. 1864, Elisabeth Knapp; d. 2 Jan 1915; bur. Spring Branch, TX 4 Jan 1915. Ref: p. 286.

Sophie Kober b. Breddin, Brandenburg 9 Mar 1834; m. TX, Christian Koehn; d. Brunner, Houston Co., TX 24 Feb 1915; bur. Spring Branch, TX 25 Feb 1915. She immigrated in 1853. Ref: pp. 286-287.

Carl Herrman Rummel b. Wiesa, Sachsen (kingdom) 23 Dec 1845; d. Spring Branch, TX 21 Oct 1919; bur. Spring Branch 22 Oct 1919. Ref: p. 288.

The following is a 3056 surname index which was compiled from the 7480 entries (names) from 15,871 records from emigrants of Germany, Austria, Luxembourg and Switzerland found in German Immigrants in American Church Records, Vol. 40.
